The final solution places the beverages and pets in their respective positions according to the puzzle rules.

|             |    1     |      2       |    3      |  4   |   5     |

| Pet         |          |              |           |      |         |

Almond-milk -> turtle (7)
Dog -> tea (2)

Lemonade -> right of almond-milk (3)
Left of tea -> horse (4)
Right of milk -> turtle (5)

Not almond-milk -> hamster (6)
Sprite -> far right (8)

Left of horse -> turtle (9)

Final solution:
